alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:26PM CDT until May 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 1225 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Warden to near Bakers to 6 miles south of Crowville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Richland and northeastern Franklin Parishes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
